excerpt.rendered: Lead the culinary experience in VIP suites and corporate hospitality areas during major events.

content.rendered:
We are looking for an experienced Head Chef to lead VIP culinary operations during high-profile sporting events and concerts. You will oversee menu execution, kitchen coordination, and service standards for premium guests.

You will manage a team of chefs, ensure HACCP compliance, collaborate with hospitality teams, and deliver consistent fine-dining quality under event-time pressure.

requirements: 5+ years experience in high-volume fine dining or premium event catering
Strong leadership and team management skills (10+ kitchen staff)
Excellent knowledge of food safety standards (HACCP)
Ability to plan menus and control food costs
benefits: Work on major events in an iconic venue

excerpt.rendered: Support the Head Chef and drive flawless execution for VIP hospitality service.

content.rendered:
As Sous Chef, you will support VIP production and service execution, ensuring quality, timing, and consistency across premium guest areas.

You will supervise stations, coordinate prep, assist with ordering and inventory, and maintain hygiene standards throughout event operations.

requirements: 3+ years in fine dining, banqueting, or event catering
Solid knowledge of kitchen organization and prep planning
Ability to lead a station team under time pressure
benefits: Clear career pathway to Head Chef roles

excerpt.rendered: Create refined desserts and plated pastry for VIP guests during large-scale events.

content.rendered:
We are seeking a Pastry Chef to design and execute elegant desserts for VIP hospitality lounges and suites. You will manage pastry production, plating standards, and seasonal creations aligned with event menus.

You will work closely with the culinary leadership team to ensure premium presentation and consistent output at high volume.

requirements: 3+ years experience as pastry chef or senior pastry role
Strong plating and modern pastry techniques
Experience with production planning for high-volume service
Knowledge of allergens and labeling best practices
benefits: Creative menu space for signature desserts
Access to quality ingredients and tools

excerpt.rendered: Manage guest experience and service teams across VIP lounges, suites, and premium zones.

content.rendered:
As VIP Hospitality Service Manager, you will oversee front-of-house operations for premium guests during events. You'll coordinate service teams, ensure timing and quality, and resolve guest needs proactively.

You will partner with culinary leadership, logistics, and venue ops to deliver seamless high-end hospitality.

requirements: 4+ years in hospitality service management (hotel, events, or premium lounges)
Strong leadership and staff coordination skills
Excellent guest relation and problem-solving abilities

excerpt.rendered: Coordinate catering logistics, timing, and vendor flow for major venue events.

content.rendered:
We are hiring an Event Catering Coordinator to support planning and on-the-day execution of catering operations. You will manage schedules, deliveries, stock flow, and coordination between kitchen and service teams.

This role is critical to ensure the right resources are in the right place at the right time during high-attendance events.

requirements: 2+ years in event operations, hospitality logistics, or catering coordination
Ability to manage multiple stakeholders under pressure
Comfortable with inventory tracking and basic reporting
benefits: Training on venue processes and standards

excerpt.rendered: Execute premium dishes with precision for VIP lounges and corporate suites.

content.rendered:
We are looking for skilled Line Cooks to join our VIP hospitality kitchen team. You will run a station, execute recipes to standard, and support service during peak event periods.

Ideal candidates are fast, precise, and comfortable in high-volume environments with elevated presentation standards.

requirements: 1-3 years experience as line cook or commis in a professional kitchen
Strong mise en place and station discipline
Ability to follow recipes and plating guides
benefits: Opportunity to learn from senior chefs

excerpt.rendered: Deliver premium bar service and craft cocktails in VIP hospitality areas.

content.rendered:
We are seeking an experienced Bartender to provide high-end beverage service in VIP lounges and suites. You will prepare cocktails, manage bar stock, and ensure an exceptional guest experience.

You will work closely with service managers to maintain speed, presentation, and a polished, welcoming atmosphere.

requirements: 2+ years bartending experience in premium venues
Knowledge of classic cocktails and service etiquette
Ability to manage bar setup, stock, and cleanliness

excerpt.rendered: Welcome VIP guests, guide seating, and ensure a seamless premium experience.

content.rendered:
As a Guest Experience Host, you will be the face of our VIP hospitality spaces. You'll welcome guests, support check-in, coordinate seating, and ensure guests feel cared for throughout the event.

You will communicate with service teams and respond quickly to guest needs with professionalism and warmth.

requirements: 1+ year experience in hospitality, reception, or guest services
Fluent French; English is a plus
benefits: Great entry point into premium hospitality

excerpt.rendered: Ensure HACCP compliance and quality standards across event catering operations.

content.rendered:
We are seeking a Food Safety & Quality Supervisor to enforce hygiene, labeling, temperature controls, and process standards across kitchen and service areas during events.

You will conduct checks, support corrective actions, and help teams maintain consistent compliance in a fast-paced environment.

requirements: 3+ years in food safety or quality roles (hospitality/catering preferred)
Strong HACCP knowledge and auditing experience
Ability to train teams and enforce standards diplomatically

excerpt.rendered: Keep the kitchen running smoothly with fast, organized cleaning and stewarding support.

content.rendered:
We are hiring Kitchen Stewards to support event operations by maintaining cleanliness, washing dishes, organizing equipment, and ensuring work areas stay safe and efficient.

This role is essential to keeping service flowing during busy event periods.

requirements: Ability to work fast and stay organized
Comfortable with physical tasks and long standing periods
Basic understanding of hygiene and cleaning standards
benefits: Opportunity to grow into kitchen roles
Transport support on late shifts (where applicable)

excerpt.rendered: Lead a station in one of France's largest stadiums during major football matches and concerts.

content.rendered:
Join our culinary team at Groupama Stadium in Lyon! As Chef de Partie, you will manage your station during high-profile Olympique Lyonnais matches and large-scale events.

You will prepare dishes to the highest standards, coordinate with sous chefs, and ensure smooth service for thousands of guests.

requirements: 3+ years as commis or chef de partie
Flexibility for evening and weekend work

excerpt.rendered: Lead beverage operations across multiple bars during major sporting and entertainment events.

content.rendered:
We're looking for an experienced Bar Manager to oversee beverage service at Groupama Stadium. You'll manage bar teams, stock levels, and service quality across VIP and public areas.

Ensure fast, efficient service while maintaining premium standards for 59,000+ spectators.

requirements: Strong inventory and cost control skills

excerpt.rendered: Lead culinary operations at France's second largest stadium, home of Olympique de Marseille.

content.rendered:
An exceptional opportunity to lead the culinary team at the iconic Stade Vélodrome in Marseille. As Executive Chef, you'll oversee all food operations for 67,000+ capacity events.

Manage menus, kitchen teams, and premium hospitality while bringing Mediterranean flavors to match days and concerts.

requirements: 7+ years executive chef or senior culinary experience
Stadium, arena, or large-scale event experience preferred
Strong P&L and budget management skills
benefits: Leadership of iconic venue culinary program

excerpt.rendered: Supervise concession stands and ensure fast, quality service during OM matches.

content.rendered:
Join the Stade Vélodrome team as a Concession Team Leader! You'll supervise food and beverage kiosks, manage staff schedules, and ensure excellent guest experience during events.

Fast-paced role perfect for someone who thrives in high-energy environments.

requirements: Ability to work match days and events
Basic cash handling and POS experience

excerpt.rendered: Create memorable dining experiences for concerts and shows at Paris's premier indoor arena.

content.rendered:
Accor Arena is seeking talented Event Chefs to deliver exceptional food for concerts, sports events, and shows. You'll prepare dishes for VIP suites, artist hospitality, and premium guest areas.

Work with world-class artists and athletes while showcasing your culinary skills.

requirements: Ability to work late nights and weekends

excerpt.rendered: Deliver premium hospitality service in VIP lounges during concerts and events.

content.rendered:
Join our VIP service team at Accor Arena! You'll provide exceptional table service in premium lounges, corporate suites, and backstage areas during major events.

Perfect role for hospitality professionals who want to work exciting events while delivering five-star service.

requirements: 2+ years fine dining or premium hospitality experience

excerpt.rendered: Lead food operations at Europe's biggest metal festival, serving 180,000+ guests over 4 days.

content.rendered:
Hellfest is looking for an experienced Kitchen Manager to oversee festival food operations. You'll manage multiple food stations, coordinate with vendors, and ensure quality across the festival grounds.

This is a unique seasonal opportunity to feed the metal community at one of Europe's legendary festivals.

requirements: Festival or large outdoor event experience essential

excerpt.rendered: Join the festival food team and serve hungry metalheads at France's biggest rock festival.

content.rendered:
Be part of the Hellfest experience! We're hiring energetic crew members to work food stalls during the festival. You'll prepare and serve food, handle cash, and keep the metal community fed.

Perfect for students or anyone wanting a unique summer job at an unforgettable event.

requirements: Ability to work long festival hours
Love of live music a plus!

excerpt.rendered: Lead VIP culinary operations at the UK's most iconic stadium with 90,000 capacity.

content.rendered:
An exceptional opportunity to join Wembley Stadium as Head Chef for VIP hospitality. You'll oversee premium dining for England international matches, FA Cup finals, and major concerts.

Lead a team of 25+ chefs and deliver world-class cuisine to corporate guests and VIP visitors.

requirements: 7+ years in premium hospitality or event catering

excerpt.rendered: Support VIP service operations during world-class events at Wembley Stadium.

content.rendered:
Join the Wembley hospitality team as a Runner! You'll support service in VIP boxes, transport food and beverages, and help create memorable experiences for premium guests.

Great entry-level opportunity to work at iconic events while building your hospitality career.

benefits: Work major sporting and music events
